title: gOkulAbdi candra
sahitya:
gOkulAbdi candra.  rAgA:  bhUpALa.  cApu tALA.


1:  gOkulAbdi cndra gOpika yadu vandya gOpinAtha svAmi eLO 
I kAlagaLili yAkenna maradiyO pAkashAsana vandya eLO bEga eLO 
 caraNam 2    iccayandali bandu icca daityara konda macca rUpa svAmi eLO 
smaccayadali iri mecci bennali potta svacca kUrma rUpa svAmi eLO bEga eLO
 caraNam 3    Adi daityara kondu dAraNiyanu tanda ghOra varAha svAmi eLO 
ati ghOra nakhaLinda sILi daityara konda jvAla narasimha eLO bEga eLO
 caraNam 4    bAladanva pondi baliya dAnava bEDi balavanta vAmana eLO 
mEle koDaLiyinda daityara konda Adi bhArgava svAmi eLO bEga eLO
 caraNam 5    mUru lOkavnnALda asura rAvaNa bhangadIra rAmacandra eLO 
nUrAru sAvira strIgala kUDADida cOra krSNamUrti eLO bEga eLO
 caraNam 6    vAma lOcaniyara nEmava keDisida kAma buddha rUpa eLO 
bhUmi pAlakaranu pAlisentenutali shrIvatsara kalki eLO bEga eLO
 caraNam 7    pAlakaru ninna kAlu gejjeya kaNDu sOli sokkudAre eLO 
nIla varNa krSNa pAlisennanu svAmi purandara viTTalane eLO bEga eLO
